ministry.name: Video Ministry
ministry.overview: Our Mission: We are committed to the presentation of the Gospel of Jesus Christ, edification of the church body and ministering to the lost and hurting through the use of video production in a professional and compelling manner.

p.strong: Our Vision: The Video ministry desires to equip its servants to grow into stronger Christian, win the lost to Christ, and send out the Gospel into all the world all through video production that glorifies God.

long-description.p: The Video Ministry utilizes standard video production equipment to enhance, document, and facilitate the worship services. We produce the Calvary Continuum show which airs on Saturdays at noon on cable channel 11. We also stream, and archive all services for the web.
